entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a person who is grinning at Harry and Cedric. He mentions that Mr. Krum and Miss Delacour will enter the maze.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who knows about the creatures in Hagrid's events. He thinks it won't be fun but nods politely.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a person who is present with Harry and Bagman.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who provides creatures for events like this maze.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who taps Harry on the shoulder and will enter the maze.

entities.name: delacour
entities.description: Delacour is a person who will enter the maze.

relationships.description: Krum taps Harry on the shoulder.
